agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Pensions, Investments & Financial Services TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, March 26, 2019 PLACE: E2.026 CHAIR: Rep. Jim Murphy The committee will meet to consider the following: HB 9 Bonnen, Greg | et al. Relating to the contributions to and benefits under the Teacher Retirement System of Texas. HB 996 Collier Relating to the collection of consumer debt by debt buyers. HB 1731 Davis, Yvonne Relating to the payment for funeral services performed by a transferring funeral home under a prepaid funeral contract or a purchase agreement for funeral services or merchandise. HB 1887 Murphy Relating to the evaluation and reporting of investment practices and performance of certain public retirement systems. HB 2282 Parker Relating to the applicability of certain limitations on the capture and use of biometric identifiers to financial institutions. HB 2706 Capriglione Relating to local government public investment of funds. HB 2820 Flynn Relating to the registration and certification of certain investment products made available to public school employees. HB 2932 White Relating to the payment for funeral services performed by a transferring funeral home under a purchase agreement for funeral services or merchandise. HB 3162 Flynn Relating to prepaid funeral benefits. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
